scripts.clean: npm run clean:css && npm run clean:js
scripts.build:css: npm run clean:css; node-sass --include-path src/scss src/scss/pivotal-cards.scss|postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions'|postcss --use cssnano > build/pivotal-cards.css
scripts.build:js: npm run clean:js; browserify src/js/pivotal-cards.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]|uglifyjs > build/pivotal-cards.js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
